snippet: As high-speed Internet and better cellphone reception reach a remote corner of Vermont, where a school offers a semester on a farm for high school students, questions are arising about regulating use.
abstract: As high-speed Internet and better cellphone reception reach a remote corner of Vermont, where a school offers a semester on a farm for high school students, questions are arising about regulating use.
